scripts.nuke: docker stop wakesportsDocker && docker rm wakesportsDocker && docker volume rm wakesportsData && rm -rf prisma/migrations && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.launchDocker: docker run --name wakesportsDocker -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=docker -d -p 5432:5432 -v wakesportsData:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:latest
scripts.createDB: npx prisma2 migrate save --name 'init' --experimental && npx prisma2 migrate up --experimental
scripts.restart: npm run nuke && npm install && npm run launchDocker && wait-on tcp:5432 && npm run createDB && npm run generate && npm run seed
scripts.new: npm install && npm run launchDocker && npm run createDB && npm run generate && npm run seed && npm run start
